plot: Ramses loves to swim at the seaside but the law doesn't allow it. He starts looking for a place to swim.
title: ¡Quiero ir a la playa!
plot_es: Ramses loves to swim at the seaside but the law doesn't allow it. He starts looking for a place to swim.
plot_en: Ramses loves to swim at the seaside but the law doesn't allow it. He starts looking for a place to swim.
